title: Caroline Flack puts on a leggy display in denim hotpants during a sunkissed stroll in LA
text:
She is soaking up the sun stateside before the start of winter Love Island.

And Caroline Flack looked sensational as she stepped out in Los Angeles on Thursday.

The presenter, 39, flaunted her honed legs in a tiny pair of denim shorts paired with tan suede boots.

Leggy: Caroline Flack looked sensational as she stepped out in Los Angeles on Thursday

The star paired this with a vintage Wranglers vest top and a scarlet leather Gucci handbag.

Her caramel tresses were pulled up into a high ponytail while the beauty shielded her eyes from the sun with a pair of stylish shades.

Making the most of her natural beauty, the star went make-up free for the occasion.

Caroline's outing comes as Love Island, the show she has presented since 2015, prepares to return with the first winter series in its history.

Insiders have confirmed to MailOnline that staff working on the show are jetting off to Cape Town, South Africa, on New Year's Day (January 1) and have a week to prepare before the official anticipated launch on January 8.

The new cast will fly out just days before the series begins, but bosses will recruit 'test Islanders' in the lead up to ensure they know the best places to create maximum drama.

A TV source told MailOnline: 'The new Winter Love Island will launch the second week of January.

Radiant: Making the most of her natural beauty, the star went make-up free for the occasion

'Bosses are still deciding on the final date but it is thought to be January 8 – a week after staff arrive in South Africa.

'It has been decided that the show will run for six weeks instead of the usual eight.

'The new cast of singletons fly out just days before the launch but bosses work with test Islanders to uncover the best spots in the villa to create drama.'

Islanders will meet in a brand new villa that has been built especially for the show, with Caroline returning as host and Iain Stirling, 31, as narrator.

Sunkissed: Caroline looked stylish as she walked along in the sunshine
